person.persName: John Buck Deaton (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Virginia native. married to Malinda Deaton. Father of Thomas Deaton, Edward Deaton, Jemina Deaton, Elizabeth Deaton, Alexander Deaton, John Deaton, Joseph Deaton, and Lewis Deaton. Delegate from Breathitt County to the State Democratic Party Convention in 1858. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Breathitt County in 1864.
